name: EQUALS PORTION OF (MID)
description: This is the equivalent of the TAS Professional 3.0 command Equals Portion Of.
syntax: EQUALS PORTION OF (MID) start_val num_chrs mem_area#

parameters.name: start_val
parameters.description: The starting character in the parse_fld. The first character in the field is at position 1.

parameters.name: num_chrs
parameters.description: The number of characters to get from the parse_fld.

parameters.name: mem_area#
parameters.description: If you are actually getting the characters from a memory area then this is the number (from 1-4). NOTE: Even if you want to use a memory area you must still specify a parse_fld, although it will be ignored during execution of the command.

comments: This is the equivalent of the TAS Professional 3.0 command Equals Portion Of.
